page.title: 08WORCESTER SWIMMING POOL
page.content: Worcester Swimming Pool was opened in 1970.Before that Worcester only had an outdoor pool.When we go to the pool now,we can see a slope down into a pit with flowers in it.That is where the old pool used to be-we think it is very small.The diving pit was not separate,and you could stand on the bottom in the deep end.It was only open from May to September because people didn't want to swim in the winter.People called the old pool "Parkes'Puddle".The new pool is deeper,longer,and the diving area is separated. You are not allowed to swim in the diving area.There is a special little pool for learners and babies which is 7 metres by 12 metres. Before even the old pool was built,children used to have swimming lessons from an old barge on the river.This was in the 1920's.
